certifications.title: The Complete Web Development Boot Camp

projects.name: Intent Mapping Machine Learning Model
projects.description: Utilized to segregate user queries between different intents and provide the perfect matched intent query remark. Played a critical role in encapsulating data from Excel using openpyxl for better performance. Employed a Sentence Transformer and a similarity threshold to assist in the lemmatization of sentences and used cosine scores to compare the semantic meaning of sentences. Achieved 85% accuracy by utilizing the spacy model for sentence transformation.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Leveraged a full-stack approach, combining HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the front-end end, and ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, and MongoDB for the back end. Gained insights into user experience design, database management, and end-to-end application development. Obtained practical experience in database connectivity, CRUD operations, and data modeling.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Created a portfolio website to showcase skills, projects, and professional background, serving as a digital resume for potential employers or clients. Structured the content using HTML, styled with CSS, and added interactivity, smooth scrolling, and dynamic effects using JavaScript. Gained experience in handling front-end web applications for scalability and performance.
